definition: the trait of behaving like an imp
details:
noun
- the trait of behaving like an imp
= synonyms: mischievousness
- the trait of acting unpredictably and more from whim or caprice than from reason or judgment
= example: the trait of acting unpredictably and more from whim or caprice than from reason or judgment
= synonyms: flightiness, arbitrariness, whimsy, whimsey, capriciousness
